category: news
title: "Self-driving tractors sow cotton seeds on 126,000 hectares of farmland in Xinjiang"
excerpt: "In early April, cotton began to be planted on 1.9 million mu (about 126,666 hectares) of arable land in Shaya County, northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region. Now self-driving tractors can help farmers spread cotton seeds in a more efficient way."
